assetProfile.address2: 10th Floor, Room 1002 One Harbour Gate 18 Hung Leun Road, Hung Hom
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: China Tobacco International (HK) Company Limited trades in tobacco products. The company operates through Tobacco Leaf Products Export Business, Tobacco Leaf Products Import Business, Cigarettes Export Business, New Tobacco Products Export Business, and Brazil Operation Business segments. The Tobacco Leaf Products Export Business segment procures and exports tobacco leaf products to cigarette manufacturers and authorized purchasing agents of cigarette manufacturers in Southeast Asia, Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan. The Tobacco Leaf Products Import Business segment imports tobacco leaf products to Mainland China. The Cigarettes Export Business segment exports cigarettes to duty-free outlets and cigarettes wholesalers in Thailand, Singapore, Hong Kong, Macau, and Mainland China. The New Tobacco Products Export Business segment exports new tobacco products to retailers, cigarettes wholesalers, and independent third parties. The Brazil Operation Business segment is involved in the procurement, processing, and sale of tobacco leaves; and sale of agricultural materials related to tobacco production in Brazil and internationally. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. China Tobacco International (HK) Company Limited is a subsidiary of China Tobacco International Group Limited.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Chengrui  Wang
companyOfficers.title: Mang. of the Securities Department, Company Sec. & Exec. Director
